Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1985, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Traded from San Diego to Los Angeles on 7/5/1985 (Going to SD: RF Kenny Williams, SS Bill Russell, LF Ken Landreaux, P Charlie Kerfeld. Going to LAD: 2B Alan Wiggins, 2B Tim Flannery)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1985...
Traded from Los Angeles to Texas on 3/4/1986 (Going to LAD: P Matt Williams, P Yorkis Perez, CF Oddibe McDowell. Going to TEX: 2B Greg Brock, 2B Tim Flannery)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/1987, off Jose Rijo (OAK)...
10/27/1988: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $1,520,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/20/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
